Before using our application, we invite you to read and accept the following terms and conditions that govern the use of our game:
1. Acceptance of the Terms and Conditions: By using our application, you accept and undertake to comply with the terms and conditions established in this document. If you do not agree with any of the terms, please do not use our application.
2. Use of the Application: Our game is intended solely for personal use and entertainment. You must not use it for any illegal, fraudulent or unauthorized purpose. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations while using our application.
3. Content and Intellectual Property: All content in our application, including but not limited to graphics, designs, logos, text, images and software, is the exclusive property of the owners of the mobile card game and is protected by copyright and other property laws intellectual You may not copy, modify, distribute or use our content without our prior written consent.
4. Privacy: We care about your privacy and security. By using our application, you accept our privacy policy, which you can consult in the corresponding section of the application. We collect and process certain personal data in order to provide you with an optimal gaming experience and improve our services.
5. Responsibility: We are not responsible for any damage, loss or damage resulting from the use of our application. Nor are we responsible for any service interruption, technical errors or any other incident that may arise during the use of the application.
